ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Happy to see
you. Do you wanna talk for a bit?
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2101_01_10: By the way, do you need this?
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’m not sure if you’ll use it, but you can keep it!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2102_02_10: I’m glad you seem to like it!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
This is from me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s
proof of our friendship.
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2103_02_10: You could say it represents my gratitude!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2103_03_10: Keep showing me how strong you are!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Can we talk for a bit?
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Oh hey! I wanted to talk about
something, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Is this for me? Thanks! I’ll treasure it!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Ooh! How did you know I wanted this? I’ll keep
it. Thanks!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Now, what shall I give you in return... No, don’t
tell me! I’ll figure it out!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! Let’s talk again!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8201_2401_02_10: Let’s chat again! I’ll keep my schedule open!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I never knew there was a place like this
on Pasio...
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I think great combinations come from great
communication.
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8001_0701_03_10: So I’ll also try to expand my social circle here!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Thinking back on it, a lot of things happened
during my first Gym Challenge...
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
When I was traveling around the cities, I battled
against Leon, Sonia, and Nessa so many times.
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
When I told Hop and his friends about it, he told
me they did the same! I guess everyone walks the
same path.
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I want to keep changing up my fashion, just like
how the weather is always changing!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I’m sure it’s fun for others when they see my style.
And more importantly, it’s fun for me, too!
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
But I guess that only applies to my personal time.
Usually I just wear a uniform...
ch0257_00_qibana_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Disappointed? No worries. You can just
follow my social media accounts!
